segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is growing so fast; someone could slip and fall hard.

segments.text: I see the boy on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.

segments.text: It's tilting backward— he could tumble down any moment.

segments.text: The girl is helping him, reaching up, but they're both in danger on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and who knows what damage that's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, everything looks so peaceful in the garden.

segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are being sneaky, but the risk isn't worth it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens; my heart is racing just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
